ygData.subject: Re: DR Question from Ryan
ygData.msgSnippet: JOHNDREW!!!!!   Hey there hon!!  How are you? So, you are still in DR, eh? Well, Michael quit EQ and went back to DR...yep yep, left me a widow in EQ. But I
ygData.messageBody:
JOHNDREW!!!!! Hey there hon!! How are you? So, you are still in DR, eh?
Well, Michael quit EQ and went back to DR...yep yep, left me a widow in EQ.
But I really had gotten bored with DR and simply couldn't get back into it,
and didn't have time for both, so I shelved DR. Still have Aderes and
NIkira and Teira, but don't plan on playing it again, unless I get really
bored or tired with EQ. Besides, DR was 3 times as expensive as EQ, which
to me is ridiculous. Simutronics is not customer friendly, and that's
another reason I left.

Yah, you two folks poke your heads into Rathe sometime...I have my little
newbie druid Tiasha, who is only 11. She's hunting in oasis. Of course
Mikaela is almost 47 now, so she plays with the big boys in lguk, nagefen's
lair and permafrost en route to Vox.

<big hugs to ya>

Mik
